verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Today] , [ARG1: a video] [V: broke] out [C-ARG1: of Melania Trump rejecting Donald Trump 's hand when he tried to hold it during a White House ceremony with French President Emmanuel Macron] .

Today , a video broke out of [ARG0: Melania Trump] [V: rejecting] [ARG1: Donald Trump 's hand] [ARGM-TMP: when he tried to hold it during a White House ceremony with French President Emmanuel Macron] .

Today , a video broke out of Melania Trump rejecting Donald Trump 's hand [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: he] [V: tried] [ARG1: to hold it during a White House ceremony with French President Emmanuel Macron] .

Today , a video broke out of Melania Trump rejecting Donald Trump 's hand when [ARG0: he] tried to [V: hold] [ARG1: it] [ARGM-TMP: during a White House ceremony with French President Emmanuel Macron] .
